title: La Voix Embarks on Annie UK Tour as Miss Hannigan
summary: La Voix, a well-known drag queen and former Strictly Come Dancing contestant, has announced her role as Miss Hannigan in the upcoming UK tour of the Annie musical, starting in May 2026. The tour will commence in Wimbledon and extend to cities including Birmingham, Manchester, Plymouth, Canterbury, Cardiff, Milton Keynes, and Edinburgh, with additional performances planned for 2027 in Norwich, Sheffield, and Glasgow. La Voix expressed immense excitement, describing Miss Hannigan as a loud, chaotic, and glamorous character that she feels destined to portray. This role has been previously held by notable figures such as Paul O'Grady, Craig Revel Horwood, and Miranda Hart. The article also touches on La Voix's recent departure from Strictly Come Dancing due to an injury, highlighting her resilience and transition to this new venture. Overall, it covers her career move, the tour's schedule, and her personal enthusiasm for the role.
